West_Jordan.Conservation Garden Park: Conservation Garden Park is located on the grounds of Jordan Valley Water Conservancy District at 8215 South 1300 West, West Jordan, Utah. The project consists of approximately six acres of demonstration gardens and waterwise landscape exhibits and the new Education Center (under construction) which was completed and opened to the public in summer 2011. The Center is designed to LEED Platinum standards, showcases the best available environmental building technologies, and broadens the theme of the gardens to include conservation of energy and natural resources.
